Warhound's Wrath.name: Warhound's Wrath
Warhound's Wrath.fullText:
Warhound of Bane Attack 11Warhound's Wrath

You strike a solid blow, and the god of war smiles upon you, letting new strength flow back into your wounded body.

Encounter        Divine, Healing, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you regain hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier. If you are bloodied, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage, and you instead regain hit points equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 29.
Warhound's Wrath.flavor: You strike a solid blow, and the god of war smiles upon you, letting new strength flow back into your wounded body.
Warhound's Wrath.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you regain hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier. If you are bloodied, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage, and you instead regain hit points equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier.

Triumphant Strike.name: Triumphant Strike
Triumphant Strike.fullText:
Warhound of Bane Attack 20Triumphant Strike

You channel the war god’s ire to deliver a terrible strike against your foe, driving fear into its allies, who see Bane’s hand upon you.

Daily        Divine, Fear, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). In addition, you mark the primary target until the end of the encounter.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 5.

  Secondary Target: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. Will

  Hit: The secondary target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 29.
Triumphant Strike.flavor: You channel the war god’s ire to deliver a terrible strike against your foe, driving fear into its allies, who see Bane’s hand upon you.
Triumphant Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). In addition, you mark the primary target until the end of the encounter.
Triumphant Strike.effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 5.
Triumphant Strike.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
Triumphant Strike.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).

Bane's Fortune.name: Bane's Fortune
Bane's Fortune.fullText:
Warhound of Bane Utility 12Bane's Fortune

You bask in the glow of Bane’s favor, extending good fortune to your comrades and ill fortune to your enemies.

Encounter        Divine, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, you and any ally within 3 squares of you gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and saving throws, and any enemy marked by you and within 3 squares of you takes a –1 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws. The stance ends if an enemy hits you.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 29.
Bane's Fortune.flavor: You bask in the glow of Bane’s favor, extending good fortune to your comrades and ill fortune to your enemies.
Bane's Fortune.effect: Until the stance ends, you and any ally within 3 squares of you gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and saving throws, and any enemy marked by you and within 3 squares of you takes a –1 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws. The stance ends if an enemy hits you.
